name: Connection Defender
description:
This game was my entry to the 2018 JS13k game jam. You can view the entry page here. It got some great feedback and placed #23 overall out of 150.

I built the game over the course of 2 days and used plain old JS. I feel the game could have placed higher if I included sound. Despite this I am delighted with the result of my first ever game jam entry.

Note: Best played with keyboard and mouse.
